gospel.text:
[[Lc 9,43b]]While they were all amazed at his every deed, he said to his disciples,
[[Lc 9,44]]"Pay attention to what I am telling you. The Son of Man is to be handed over to men."
[[Lc 9,45]]But they did not understand this saying; its meaning was hidden from them so that they should not understand it, and they were afraid to ask him about this saying.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke

first_reading.text:
[[Za 2,5]]I, Zechariah, raised my eyes and looked: there was a man with a measuring line in his hand.
[[Za 2,6]]"Where are you going?" I asked. "To measure Jerusalem," he answered; "to see how great is its width and how great its length."
[[Za 2,7]]Then the angel who spoke with me advanced, and another angel came out to meet him,
[[Za 2,8]]and said to him, "Run, tell this to that young man: People will live in Jerusalem as though in open country, because of the multitude of men and beasts in her midst.
[[Za 2,9]]But I will be for her an encircling wall of fire, says the LORD, and I will be the glory in her midst."
[[Za 2,14]]Sing and rejoice, O daughter Zion! See, I am coming to dwell among you, says the LORD.
[[Za 2,15a]]Many nations shall join themselves to the LORD on that day, and they shall be his people, and he will dwell among you.
first_reading.title: Book of Zechariah

psalm.text:
[[Jr 31,10]]Hear the word of the LORD, O nations, 
Proclaim it on distant isles, and say: 
He who scattered Israel, now gathers them together, 
He guards them as a shepherd his flock.
[[Jr 31,11]]The LORD shall ransom Jacob, 
he shall redeem him from the hand of his conqueror.
[[Jr 31,12a]]Shouting, they shall mount the heights of Zion, 
[[Jr 31,12b]]they shall come streaming to the LORD’s blessings:
[[Jr 31,13]]Then the virgins shall make merry and dance, 
and young men and old as well. 
I will turn their mourning into joy, 
I will console and gladden them after their sorrows.
psalm.title: Book of Jeremiah
